Keys competencies and Skills
� Have long time working experience (over ﬁve years)
� Have strong knowledge of Java, PHP, MVC standard, OOP, conding convention
� Have working with PHP framework Laravel
� Have experience of using JavaScript libraries, frameworks: Jquery, ReactJS
� Have experience working with some tools, package manager for frontend or backend such as : composer, npm,
yarn, yeoman
� Experience of using design patterns, bootstrap, MDB React
� Experience of database management : able to work with MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MS SQL. Know how
to design database, optmize database, writing best query, functions store procedure etc.
� Experience of using UML for modeling system
� Able to admnistrate Lunix / Winddow server and experience with client-server archicteture
� Experience of using some services of AWS such as : EC2, RDS, S3
Other skills and knowledge
� Able to working under some method of project management such as : Agile, Scrum, Planing Poker
� Always ready to learn new trends technological
� Autonomous and able to propose a good solution to solve the problem
� Experience with using Git for manager and share source code
� Machine learning & AI: Scikit, Gaml, Jade
